de.itschleemilch.mixprocessing.script

Class ScriptingApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.itschleemilch.mixprocessing.script.ScriptingApi
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventManager

    public class ScriptingApi
extends java.lang.Object
    MixProcessing's scripting API. Important: All methods have to return a value. Reason: Remote API returns a value to each call.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
